Text:
How to Play:
1.Download the game
2.Please change filename like that 
INSTALL.pkg

. PKG May must be lowercase to read ps3
PKG should be change small like this .pkg
3.install from xmb

To play this game, you must insert the following disc.
Insert the disc, and then start the game again (8001003E)

(-Blank Disk Name-)

This is the error message that I can't get around.

@Psychosanity You shoud have Zone of the Enders HD mounted to launch Metal Gear Rising Demo. Otherwise you'll get error like yours. Therefore unless someone comes out with special crack, Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance Demo as a separate torrent is pointless.  You should get Zone of the Enders HD first (which already contains package with the demo.
